title: Victorybit1
author: Victorybit1
created_time: November 08, 2023, 12:30:22 PMLast edit: November 08, 2023, 01:16:45 PM by Victorybit1
content: The rate at which young people dey get diabetis and hypertension these days is alarming.The rate at wish young boys dey consume beer with no moderation is increasing everyday. Some go take five to ten bottle of beers dey call am enjoyment. That kind life no be enjoyment. You dey only destroy your body system.Excess consumption of alcohol fit cause diabetes. E get wetin dey regulate our sugar intake , them dey call am INSULIN. When you take too much beer, e go make the insulin no dey work well again, this will then cause increase blood sugar level. Excess beer dey destroy won organ for our body wey them dey call Pancreas. This pancreas  dey produce Insulin wey dey regulate sugar as I mentioned earlier. Imagine say that organ is destroyed, that's the worst type of diabetes Do you also know that excess beer consumption  dey cause Obesity which is a risk factor for diabetes?Diabetes is also link with hypertension, e mean say person wey his or her sugar level dey high fit get hypertension too which is dangerous to you heart, if e affect heart, na Cardiac arrest, if e affect kidney, na kidney failure and if e affect  brain, na stroke be that.Some young guys now dey complain say their manhood no dey stand well( Poor Erection) some of them na due to excess sugar for body. So if you get this kind issue and you know say you dey drink alcohol well well, go check your sugar level.Diabetes no get cure, you can only manage it with life style changes till you go old die. I say make I bring this thread here because I get person wey get this diabetes for young age and I know wetin the person they pass through. Please drink in moderation if you choose to drink, and do not make it a daily lifestyleI hope this message help someone here.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Long term effect of excessive drinking can lead to reduce in the immune system which can make disease to penetrate. If alcohol can lead to hypertension (high blood pressure), it can lead to blood clotting which can lead to stroke, CAD, kidney failure and angina. It can also damage the pancreas, liver and some other internal organs.

Its well known that “excess of anything is harmful” , if we try alcohol for once or twice, or we take it occasionally then it is not bad but if we start liking it and taking it n regular basis then it is harmful for us.
